ingredients.ingredient: ¾ cup Italian seasoned bread crumbs
1 (1 ounce) package dry Ranch-style dressing mix

cookingTips: Combine bread crumbs and ranch mix in a shallow dish for easy coating
Pat fish dry before breading for better crust adherence
Use medium-high heat and don't overcrowd pan—fish cooks quickly and evenly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Do you prefer pan-frying or baking? Both work well with this breading mixture.
